data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) Post Albuterol, Generation 3 Exam 2 and New Offspring Spouse Exam 2. Only a minority of subjects who performed baseline (pre-bronchodilator) spirometry were asked to perform post-bronchodilator spirometry. This request was made of all subjects whose baseline spirometry demonstrated EITHER a FEV1-to-FVC ratio less than 90 % of the predicted value OR a FEV1 less than 85 % of the predicted value.

variable.name: fv1_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 1 second (FEV1) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: fv3_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 3 second (FEV3) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: fv6_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 6 second (FEV6) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: fvc_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: pf_alb_2
variable.description: Peak Expiratory Flow (FEFMAX) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol

variable.name: tfvc_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Time - Highest FVC value among acceptable maneuvers, Albuterol
variable.comment: Forced expiratory time of the acceptable maneuver with the highest FVC.

variable.name: rfev_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume Reproducibility (calculated variable), Albuterol
variable.comment: FEV1 reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimals after processing.
variable.value: Reproducibility criteria was not met: two highest FEV values were not within 0.155 liters (> = 0.155 L)
Reproducibility criteria was met: two highest FEV values were within 0.155 liters (<0.155 L)

variable.name: rfvc_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Vital Capacity Reproducibility (calculated variable), Albuterol
variable.comment: FVC reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimals after processing.
variable.value: Reproducibility criteria was not met: two highest FVC values were not within 0.155 liters (> = 0.155 L)
Reproducibility criteria was met: two highest FVC values were within 0.155 liters (<0.155 L)

variable.name: rbb_alb_2
variable.description: Ratio best FEV1 / best FVC (calculated variable), Albuterol
variable.comment: Best FEV1 and Best FVC can come from different acceptable efforts.

variable.name: mmf_alb_2
variable.description: Max Mid Expiratory Flow Rate (FEF25-75) - Best Effort, Albuterol

variable.name: ff1_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) at 25% of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC), (FEF25) - Best Effort, Albuterol

variable.name: ff2_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) at 50% of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC), (FEF50) - Best Effort, Albuterol

variable.name: ff3_alb_2
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) at 75% of Forced Vital Capacity (FVC), (FEF75) - Best Effort, Albuterol
